question: A square loop of side 2m lies in the Y-Z plane in a region having a magnetic field <katex>$\vec{B}=(5\hat{i}+3\hat{j}-4\hat{k})\text{T}$</katex>. The magnitude of magnetic flux through the square loop is
explanation: Area vector <katex>$\vec{A}$</katex> for Y-Z plane is along X-axis: <katex>$\vec{A} = (2 \times 2) \hat{i} = 4\hat{i}$</katex>.
